snippet: A day after 14 colleagues in a county health department were murdered at their office, family and friends tried to make sense of a devastating loss.
abstract: Authorities announce that most of victims of mass shooting in San Bernardino, Calif, were employees of San Bernardino County Dept of Health, and many were friends and colleagues of shooter Syed Rizwan Farook.

byline.original: By LIAM STACK and JACK HEALY
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Jess Bidgood, John Corrales, Jennifer Medina, Katie Rogers, Rick Rojas, Marc Santora and Daniel Victor. Susan C. Beachy and Kitty Bennett contributed research.

lead_paragraph: A day after 14 colleagues in a county health department were murdered at their office, family and friends tried to make sense of a devastating loss.

headline.main: Where They Shared Their Working Hours, and Their Dying Moments
headline.print_headline: They Shared Their Working Hours, and Their Dying Moments
